carcassonne.view

Interface ViewWindow

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FakeWindow, GameWindow

    public interface ViewWindow
    This is a part of Carcassonne project. The project is created for learning and practicing java and not intended for distribution. Created by Andrey on 14/01/16.
